at the beginning of your upkeep each opponent draws a card
at the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep that player mills two cards
at the beginning of your upkeep each player discards a card
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player discards a card at random
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player sacrifices a land

at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player exiles a card at random from their hand the player may play that card this turn at the beginning of the next end step if the player hasn't played the card they put it into their graveyard
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player loses n life
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player discards a card
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player sacrifices a nonminus zombie creature
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player sacrifices a nonbasic land
each player exiles two cards from their hand
